main event: The UFO report consists of various sightings in different locations such as Michigan, Indiana, New York, New Jersey, and North Carolina, occurring between 1952 and 1957.
interesting points: A sighting in New York described an object lasting for 11:30 minutes with a direction of 1.2 one C/N to SE, indicating a detailed and prolonged observation.
There is a mention of an unusual auroral display featuring weird-looking red glows observed on November 6th, which could be related to the reported UFO sightings.
Multiple sightings report stationary lights, drifting movements, and specific directions, indicating diverse types of observed phenomena.
The sightings have durations ranging from 2 minutes to 15 minutes, suggesting sustained periods of observation by witnesses.
The presence of various sightings in different states over the years indicates a pattern of strange aerial phenomena during that time period.
sighted object: various UFO sightings including lights, stationary objects, and drifting movements
location: Michigan, Indiana, New York, New Jersey, North Carolina
